description: This rule detects process execution patterns found in intrusions related to the Hermetic Wiper malware attacks against Ukraine in February 2022 Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Hermetic Wiper TG Process Patterns
query: (process.executable:*\\policydefinitions\\postgresql.exe OR process.command_line:(*CSIDL_SYSTEM_DRIVE\\temp\\sys.tmp* OR *\ 1>\ \\127.0.0.1\\ADMIN$\\__16*) OR (process.command_line:*powershell\ \-c\ * AND process.command_line:*\\comsvcs.dll\ MiniDump\ * AND process.command_line:*\\winupd.log\ full*))
